descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new follower to the game - Merhart - The Werewolf.
He uses only werewolf attacks, so, not immersion breaking.
You can find him on top of Western Watchtower (see screenshot).
He levels with you, even if you don\'t take him with you.

INSTALLATION:
1. Download the archive
2. Unrar the archive in your Skyrim/Data Directory
3. That\'s it..

If you find any bugs, issues or anything else... Post a comment.

I was working on a Dragon Priest follower, but it seems that i can\'t make him to talk with me...


MY OTHER MODS:

Make anyone your follower http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15805
New Follower - Argortha - The Daedric Princess http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15853
author: leothebest15
